mapper.select: select (select express_space between 10 to 20) EDS, count(*) cnt, DATE_FORMAT(express_req_date, '%Y-%m') ymd from express where DATE_FORMAT(express_req_date, '%Y-%m') = #{expressReqDate} group by EDS order by ymd

select (select name from code where code = express.express_category) EC, count(*) cnt, DATE_FORMAT(express_req_date, '%Y') ymd from express where DATE_FORMAT(express_req_date, '%Y') = #{expressReqDate} and (select name from code where code = express.express_category) is not null group by express_category order by ymd
